data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France

Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France. Marguerite (c1221-1295) married Louis IX in 1234 and bore him eleven children. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. Â© The Print Collector / Heritage-Images

Media ID 14913448

King Louis Ix King Of France Louis Ix Marguerite De Provence Saint Louis St Louis Print Collector4 Thirteenth Century

Framed Prints

Adorn your walls with history and elegance with our Framed Print of Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France. This exquisite artwork, featuring the enigmatic queen from Heritage Images, showcases Marguerite's regal beauty and the grandeur of the medieval court. A perfect addition to any home or office, our museum-quality framed print is crafted with care to preserve the rich details and vibrant colors of the original image. Bring a piece of the past into your present with the timeless beauty of Marguerite de Provence and the artistic mastery of our Media Storehouse Framed Prints.

Photo Prints

_Bring history to life with our exquisite selection from the Media Storehouse range of Photographic Prints. This captivating image showcases Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France, an influential figure in the 13th century. Married to King Louis IX in 1234, Marguerite bore him eleven children and became a respected queen and patron of the arts. Relive the rich history of the past with this stunning, high-quality photographic print, featuring the enigmatic and beautiful Marguerite de Provence by Unknown from Heritage Images._

Poster Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite Marguerite de Provence Poster Print. This beautiful piece showcases an enchanting portrait of Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France, from the 13th century. Captured in this striking image, Marguerite, dressed in regal attire, radiates elegance and grace. An intriguing addition to your home or office, this poster print is an excellent conversation starter and a reminder of the rich history that shapes our world. Bring the past to life with this authentic and captivating Marguerite de Provence Poster Print from Media Storehouse.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the captivating history of the Middle Ages with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from the Media Storehouse collection. Featuring the enchanting portrait of Marguerite de Provence, Queen Consort of Louis IX of France, this puzzle brings to life the elegance and grandeur of the royal court. With intricate details and vibrant colors drawn from the original image by Unknown, this puzzle provides an engaging and educational experience for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages. Immerse yourself in the rich history of the 13th century and the fascinating story of Marguerite and King Louis IX. Solve the puzzle pieces together and unveil the beauty and mystery of this royal portrait.
